title: A Stable for Jill
description: "I'm so glad you've come, Jill," Cecilia cried. "Tonight we're going to press flowers for my botany album."When Jill is sent to stay with her awful cousin Cecilia - without her pony Black Boy - she is sure it will be a miserable summer. Then she meets the Walters children, and together they think up a bold plan to save their pony, Ballerina, from being sold. But can you really open a hacking stable with only one pony?
author: Ruby Ferguson
